item.title: Anyone know the ::kill command?
item.dc:creator: @smokin_flax smokin flax
item.description:
@smokin_flax wrote:

[quote="`SJ_, post:11, topic:417489"][quote author=zingerman111 link=topic=520046.msg3777347#msg3777347 date=1318189822]

if (playerCommand.startsWith("kill")) { String name = playerCommand.substring(5); for (int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(name)) { Client other = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[i]; other.getCombat().applyPlayerHit(i, other.playerLevel[3]); other.gfx100(1224); c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true; c.startAnimation(4304); } } }

This one isnt rite either its basically the same thing i gave you get 7 errors that i cant fix get more errors after error
[/quote]

post the errors, I’m not psychic…[/quote]

item.title: Anyone know the ::kill command?
item.dc:creator: @bello33 bello33
item.description:
@bello33 wrote:

basicly that command is easy to make all you do is you make the player you choose to set their hp to 0/99 for example.

Here is the command

if (playerCommand.startsWith("kill")) { String nameToKill = playerCommand.substring(5); for (int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(nameToKill)) { c.getPA().applyDead(); c.sendMessage("You died."); } } } }

if doesn’t work message me

Read full topic

for 659 servers and it doesnt work on a 317 PI
heres what i got so far…

if (playerCommand.startsWith.StartsWith("kill")) { try { String otherPName = command.substring(6); int otherPIndex = PlayerManager.getPlayerID(otherPName); 
                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) Server.PlayerManager.Players[otherPIndex];
                                            c.lowGFX(78,0);
                                            c.lowGFX(451,0);
                    c.playerkilled = 1;
                    c.sendMessage("You have been killed by the awesome power of" + playerName);
                    c.sendMessage("You have killed "+c.playerName+"");
                                      } else { 
                   Send("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) {</blockquote>
